Notes.Text:
This update for sssd fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-3758: Fixed race condition during authorization that lead to GPO policies functioning inconsistently (bsc#1223100)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: A race condition flaw was found in sssd where the GPO policy is not consistently applied for authenticated users. This may lead to improper authorization issues, granting or denying access to resources inappropriately.
